name: never grow old
description:
forever young

∆ this pure, white flower is the perfect touch to add to your hair

∆ the natural black center makes for a subtle yet playful touch

∆ it is handmade from artificial silk flowers

∆ all flowers are unique within themselves

∆ the flower is attached to a metal duckbill clip that allows for easy pinning to all types of hairstyles

∆ the perfect accessory for any wardrobe

∆ limited availability
